Interface IOrderService

Represents business logic layer and establishes a set of available operations for Order domain object and associated classes such as PizzaOrderLine, and other classes which Order cannot exists without.

Namespace: PizzeriaServer.Orders.Services
Assembly: PizzeriaServer.dll
Syntax
interface IOrderService
